short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A google chrome extension to allow the user to receive notifications when the browser is minimized

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open google chrome and make sure that a tab is open. Then you can proceed to minimize the tab and you can go on to use another window on your laptop or desktop. Whenever you get a notification or message that looks like, Steve (1) on the tab, you will have either the taskbar light up on windows with the tab name or the app will bounce on mac
